Name: 街机捕鱼
About the game: '接机捕鱼' is a casual competitive game with the theme of deep-sea hunting. The player controls the fishing device to launch the fishing net, thereby catching the big fish. 【Game background】 This is an expedition to the underwater world, where you can perform various fishing skills and enjoy the fun of catching big fish, but not all fish are friendly, they will protect themselves in their own way and defend their own seabed world. Of course, this is also a place where adventure and opportunity coexist, and many treasures buried under the sea are waiting to be explored. 【Game Operation】 Click the left mouse button to launch the fishing net. Move the mouse to control the launch direction of the fish trap. 【Game Features】 It takes gold coins to launch a fishing net. The size and price of fishing nets issued by different fishing devices are different. The larger the fishing net, the greater the probability of catching big fish.
